thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Retailers Gear Up for Tough New Tobacco Rules

author: Melanie Grayce West
title: New York Retailers Gear Up for Tough New Tobacco Rules

organizations.name: new york city newsstand operators association

text:
Retailers across New York City are beginning to grapple with the first of many new laws designed to make it more difficult for residents to buy cigarettes, in hopes of driving down smoking rates.
The rules, being rolled out over the course of the year, involve a “barrage of changes” in the licenses necessary for retailers, according to Max Bookman, a lawyer who represents the New York City Newsstand Operators Association, a trade group.
...
